title: Apple Store is down ahead of new iPhone SE, iPad Air and ‘Mac Studio’ expected at Apple event later today
content:
In classic fashion, the Apple Store has gone down ahead of today’s ‘Peek performance’ spring media event. We expect to see the announcement of a with 5G support and a spec-bumped iPad Air. We also expect Apple to continue the Apple Silicon transition, perhaps introducing a brand new ‘Mac Studio’ model and a new Apple-branded external display at the same time.

The show starts at 10 AM Pacific Time, so stay tuned to 9to5Mac for full coverage of all the announcements.

more…
